greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of iterations of A329904 needed to reach 1.
comment: Equally, starting from A025487(n), number of iterations of A329899 needed to reach 1.
Any k > 0 occurs 2^(k-1) times in total in this sequence.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 24 2019
